title: Lithuania: Eurovizijos National Final on March 11
text:
Lithuania: Eurovizijos National Final on March 11
LRT has confirmed that they will select their entrant for the Eurovision Song Contest 2017 in Kyiv, Ukraine on March 11.
Lithuania’s search for their Eurovision 2017 participant gets underway on January 7th as “Eurovizijos” begins. A total of 10 shows will be held between January 7th and March 11 to decide the Lithuanian entrant in next years Eurovision Song Contest.
A number of small changes have been made to the selection process following discussions with participants in the competition. Performers will now no longer have to perform in the selection process on a weekly basis. Instead of the shows seeing just one singer leaving on a weekly basis, if there are 10 singers in a show then only five will make it through to the next show.
Eurovizijos will begin on January 7. In total 51 singers will be taking part in the selection with the first few shows featuring between 12 and 13 performers each. There are two former Eurovision entrants in the list of participants Sasha Song (2009) and Vilija Matačiūnaitė (2014).
The full list of participants is as follows:
Golden monkeys
Otreya
Augustė Vedrickaitė
Edgaras Lubys

Soliaris
Rasa Vaštakaitė-Shiny Raia
Neringa Šiaudikytė
For the first four shows the Lithuanian public and the jury will select the singers going through to the next round. However from the fifth show onwards an international jury will be voting alongside the in studio jury and the Lithuanian public. At least six singers will be competing in the final on March 11.
Source: LRT
